waltz.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a fairly slow dance with a regular pattern of three beats
waltz.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a piece of music intended for this type of dance
waltz.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: They waltzed elegantly around the dance floor.
waltz.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to walk somewhere calmly and confidently – used to show disapproval
waltz.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Jeff just waltzed up to the bar and helped himself to a drink.
She can’t waltz in here and start making changes.
